name: Oxygen Raid
description:
Oxygen Raid is an endless shooter... a remake of River Raid, made for a game development course.

Kill the enemies, don't crash, and fly through oxygen clouds.

We decided to share the game with you, together with its source code!

If you like it, please buy us a beer:
* Marcin 'Vigrid' Seredynski (Programming, Sound)
* Krzysztof 'Kaze' Kajpust (Graphics)

Source code: Oxygen Raid on GitHub

Made using Godot Engine.

Gameplay:

Left and Right Arrow to steer the ship and projectile.
Up Arrow to Go Fast.
Down Arrow to Go Slow.
Space to FIRE.
